author: Alex Puncekar
description:
Eric LaRocca’s You’ve Lost a Lot of Blood is a dark and moody book about a serial killer, his collected writings, and his relationship with others and himself. A story-within-a-story, told through different documents, is not new to the horror genre, but LaRocca handles it in such a way that makes its blood-soaked, nigh cosmic […]

The post REVIEW: You’ve Lost a Lot of Blood by Eric LaRocca appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: You’ve Lost a Lot of Blood by Eric LaRocca
